tool.name: SAGA.shapes_tools.13
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPES True isArraySHAPES_EXT False isArrayPOLYGONS False output_data_CUT $output_data_CUT name SAGA.shapes_tools.13 SHAPES $SHAPES METHOD $METHOD EXTENT $EXTENT AX $AX BX $BX AY $AY BY $BY DX $DX DY $DY SHAPES_EXT $SHAPES_EXT POLYGONS $POLYGONS OVERLAP $OVERLAP prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CUT $OutputSection_CUT.outputType_CUT transmissionMode_CUT $OutputSection_CUT.transmissionMode_CUT

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: SHAPES_EXT
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: OVERLAP
param.label: Minimum Overlap
param.help: minimum overlapping area as percentage of the total size of the input shape. applies to polygon layers only.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Copies all shapes that belong to the specified region.
